title: Cannot Log In To League
body: I have been trying for the past hour to log in to league and all that happens is i log in, and sitting with it apparently logging me on until this happens^ and then it continues to log in forever. My friend is having the same issue plz help.

replies.body: I'm having the same problem :x hopefully they notice and fix it soon.
hey same problem plz fix this riot absolutly retarded

It seems to me that your network is having problems establishing comms with the authentication server, and resulting in this misleading error.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Nevermind I got into the client and all the problems are much worse. I initially tried playing a game and the champ select would freeze up then 3 bans would happen all at once and then next thing I know im kicked out of champ select cuz i didnt lock in. I honestly dont know what is causing this. It may be my internet provider but im not sure.
Thank you, I really appreciate the help. I checked my security software and the first thing i saw on what was being blocked was league. Everything looks to be working good now.
